    • Constructor Detail

      • SimSearch

        public SimSearch(int type,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 TokenSetCollection targetCollection,
                 TokenSetCollection queryCollection,
                 int collectionSize,
                 ISimilarity simMeasure,
                 java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Result> resultsQueue,
                 java.io.PrintStream logStream)
        Constructor for CATEGORICAL similarity search against against an already constructed index over sets of tokens.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the similarity search query (0: CATEGORICAL).
        name - A user-specified name given to the running instance of similarity search.
        targetCollection - The data collection with tokens to search for similarity.
        queryCollection - The query collection of tokens to search for similarity.
        collectionSize - The count of results to fetch.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results
        logStream - Output stream for logging messages and statistics

      • SimSearch

        public SimSearch(int type,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 Index<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> idx,
                 double searchingKey,
                 int collectionSize,
                 ISimilarity simMeasure,
                 java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Result> resultsQueue,
                 java.io.PrintStream logStream)
        Constructor for NUMERICAL similarity search queries against an already constructed index over numerical values.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the similarity search query (2: NUMERICAL).
        name - A user-specified name given to the running instance of similarity search.
        idx - The underlying index.
        searchingKey - The key value to search against the index.
        collectionSize - The count of results to fetch.
        simMeasure - The similarity measure to be used in the search.
        resultsQueue - Queue to collect query results
        logStream - Output stream for logging messages and statistics

    • Method Detail

      • applyNumericalSimSearch

        public void applyNumericalSimSearch(Index<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> idx,
                                    java.lang.Double searchingKey,
                                    java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Result> results)
        Instantiates a numerical similarity search query.
        Parameters:
        idx - The B+-tree index used in the search. It contains (numerical) keys and (string) values for the object identifiers.
        searchingKey - The search key against the index (i.e., the numerical value specified by the query).
        results - The queue to collect query results.

      • applyCategoricalSearch

        public void applyCategoricalSearch(int k,
                                   java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Result> results)
        Instantiates a categorical similarity search query against an inverted index of sets of tokens.
        Parameters:
        k - The number of results to fetch.
        results - The queue to collect query results.

      • run

        public void run()
        Executes the specified similarity search query against the index and returns results one-by-one.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
